body: Sequential revenue and cash flow are the two most important metrics to look at when analyzing financial statements and MOST important for growth companies.  EBIT is meaningless for these type companies.   ITS ALL ABOUT REVENUE and CASH.  EBIT WILL COME IN GOOD ORDER.  Just look at AMAZON and APPLE.
